page.title: 20SUMMARY STUBHAMPTON BOTTOM
page.content: This area has a great deal to recommend it.It's current attributes are:-superb views, minimal man-made development,typical flora and fauna and varying types of farmland and woodland.The views will remain a part of the area always but the rest are always at risk. Proposals for the upgrading of the C13 road will,if they reach fruition,bring increased heavy traffic and the possibility of development along it's verge.Changes in farming and tree management may upset the delicate balance of flora and fauna. Intensive techniqiues may destroy the remaining downland.Only time will tell. The project has been carried out by a small band of villagers from Sutton Waldron helped by some of the village children.
